statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 0
SELECT product_name, last_order_date FROM inventory ORDER BY last_order_date DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE current_stock <= reorder_level
SELECT product_name, JSON_VALUE(sales_data,'$.total_sales') AS total_sales FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE reorder_level < current_stock
SELECT product_name, last_order_date FROM inventory WHERE sales_data->'total_sales' > 1000
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE last_order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, reorder_level FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < reorder_level ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT id FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE reorder_level < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Inventory INNER JOIN SalesData ON Inventory.id = SalesData.product_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, reorder_level FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND reorder_level < 50;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM Inventory JOIN Sales ON Inventory.inventory_id = Sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, trigger_event FROM Inventory JOIN Reorder_Trigger ON Inventory.inventory_id = Reorder_Trigger.trigger_id WHERE trigger_status = true;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT trigger_name FROM Triggers WHERE trigger_id = 1;
SELECT process_id, product_id, reorder_date FROM Reorder_Process WHERE reorder_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM Inventory JOIN Sales ON Inventory.product_id = Sales.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT t.trigger_name, r.reorder_date FROM Triggers t JOIN Reorder_Process r ON t.trigger_id = r.process_id ORDER BY r.reorder_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < current_stock * 0.2;
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity, reorder_level FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sales_date ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > reorder_level ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT item_name, current_inventory, sales_threshold FROM inventory JOIN reorder_triggers ON inventory.item_id = reorder_triggers.item_id WHERE current_inventory < sales_threshold ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;

SELECT notifications.notification_id, notification_text, triggers_log.log_timestamp FROM notifications LEFT JOIN triggers_log ON notifications.trigger_id = triggers_log.trigger_id WHERE notification_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY notification_timestamp ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity_sold, sales_date FROM inventory INNER JOIN sales ON inventory.item_id = sales.item_id WHERE quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 5;
